Differences Between Auto-Response Rules and Workflow Email Alerts

Auto-response rules and workflow email alerts provide similar functionality. This table lists some of the differences between them:

Workflow email alerts
	* Notifications to interested parties.
	* Runs when a case or lead is created or edited.
	* Sends one email per alert, up to 10 immediate actions, 10 time-dependent actions, and 10 time triggers.

Auto-response rules
	* Initial response to the contact who created a case or submitted a lead.
	* Runs when a case or lead is created.
	* Sends an email based on the first rule entry criteria that matches in a sequence of rule entries.
title: Understanding Service Cloud and Response Rule Differences
